backContent.html: I was part of the team that developed the academy's Dashboard for managing courses, exams, and records, as well as the generation and export of customizable Newsletters.

teamCoord.html: As head of Public Relations, I managed the Marketing of events organized by the company, as well as the sale of Merchandising, through social networks together with the team I coordinated. Together, we created a nightlife brand that was trendy for years.

sorting.text: While it was a job without specialization or great responsibilities, I admit I enjoyed helping others. I have always been motivated by my feelings of justice, and I never hesitate to help those who truly need it.

webDev.text: Creation and publication of web pages
